entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain this evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow north of Terrenceville late this evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
